name: safeer-accuknox-secret-scan
description: AccuKnox Secret Scan task designed to scan and identify secrets in Git repositories.
helpMarkDown: AccuKnox Secret Scan task designed to scan and identify secrets in Git repositories.
author: safeer-accuknox

inputs.name: results
inputs.label: Results
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies which type(s) of results to output: verified, unknown, unverified, filtered_unverified. Defaults to all types.

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch to scan. Use all-branches to scan all branches.

inputs.name: excludePaths
inputs.label: Exclude Paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: Paths to exclude from the scan.

inputs.name: accuknoxEndpoint
inputs.label: AccuKnox API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL of the CSPM panel to push the scan results to

inputs.name: accuknoxTenantId
inputs.label: AccuKnox Tenant ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the tenant associated with the CSPM panel

inputs.name: accuknoxToken
inputs.label: AccuKnox Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: The token for authenticating with the CSPM panel

inputs.name: accuknoxLabel
inputs.label: AccuKnox Label
inputs.helpMarkDown: The label created in AccuKnox SaaS for associating scan results

inputs.name: accuknoxSaveToS3
inputs.label: AccuKnox Save To S3
inputs.helpMarkDown: Automates file saving to an S3 bucket integrated with the AccuKnox platform

inputs.name: inputSoftFail
inputs.label: Soft Fail
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not return an error code if there are failed checks.
